if( ${UNIX} )
	message(STATUS "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}")
	include_directories("${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lib")
  include_directories("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib")
  link_directories("${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lib/NGT")

	add_executable(qg-l2-float qg-l2-float.cpp)
	add_dependencies(qg-l2-float ngt)
	target_link_libraries(qg-l2-float libngt.a pthread)

	find_package(MKL QUIET)
		if (MKL_FOUND)
				message(STATUS "MKL found, linking MKL libraries")
				target_link_libraries(qg-l2-float PRIVATE ${MKL_LIBRARIES})
		else()
				# 如果 MKL 不可用，尝试使用 OpenBLAS 或标准 BLAS/LAPACK
				find_package(OpenBLAS QUIET)
				if (OpenBLAS_FOUND)
						message(STATUS "OpenBLAS found, linking OpenBLAS libraries")
						target_link_libraries(qg-l2-float PRIVATE OpenBLAS::OpenBLAS)
				else()
						find_package(BLAS REQUIRED)
						find_package(LAPACK REQUIRED)
						message(STATUS "Using standard BLAS/LAPACK")
						target_link_libraries(qg-l2-float ${BLAS_LIBRARIES} ${LAPACK_LIBRARIES})
				endif()
		endif()
endif()
